programme.desc: It's the last leg for antiques experts Mark Stacey and Thomas Plant as they travel through Norfolk. With less than £30 separating them, the pressure's on as they head to their final auction in Oakham, Rutland.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Antique hunters Catherine Southon and Paul Laidlaw kick off a new series in Northern Ireland. They start as friends but there's a bust up before their first auction of the week at Omagh, County Tyron.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Catherine Southon and Paul Laidlaw soak up the stunning scenery of Northern Ireland. Will the luck of the Irish be with our antique experts as they try to uncover some hidden gems to take to auction in bonnie Scotland?

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Auctioneers Paul Laidlaw and Catherine Southon are halfway through their trip. Deep in the Scottish Borders, Catherine uncovers a pair of vintage glove puppets. But will they give her a helping hand at the Edinburgh auction?

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: In the last of the present series the experts enthuse over Pre-Columbian pots from Peru, Chinese art, English silver and American glass. Presented by Hugh Scully from the old Naval barracks church of St George at Gillingham in Kent.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Hugh Scully takes the experts to the gardens of Athelhampton House in Dorset, near to where the author Thomas Hardy was born. Finds include a valuable painting found in an attic, and a rare Scottish silver drinking cup.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Hugh Scully and a team of experts travel to Lowestoft, Suffolk, on Britain's east coast. Items include a Sèvres potty, which came from Woburn Abbey; and a traveler's calendar watch with seven subsidiary dials for different time zones.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: In the Victorian town of Oldham in Lancashire, finds include potentially valuable bookmarks, Roman toga pins unearthed by a metal detector, and three examples of work by LS Lowry – one of them on the back of a cigarette packet.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: At Clydebank, Glasgow, the surprises of the day include a pen-and-ink drawing of fairies by a celebrated Scottish artist; and a fine marine painting which caused a family fracas.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Hugh Scully takes his team of experts to Castle Howard, a 300-year-old stately home in North Yorkshire. Finds include an alabaster carving of Mary and Jesus, possibly dating from the 15th century; and an oil painting by a Royal Academician.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: The show returns to Castle Howard in North Yorkshire to find out more about the stately home, while Hugh Scully presents three unseen items from previous shows.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Hugh Scully and a team of experts travel to Devonshire, to visit the south coast resort of Torquay, where Agatha Christie set many of her thrillers. Here they find a collection of photographs and memorabilia relating to the murderer Dr Crippen.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Hugh Scully and a team of experts visit Worcester Cathedral, where their discoveries include a stoneware pot for church wine that dates from the 17th century.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: At Winchester College, Britain's oldest school, Hugh Scully admires a collection of Georgian and Victorian jewelry found hidden in the drawer of a boxed gentlemen's travelling set and a rare album of Indian watercolours from the 1820s.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Hugh Scully and the team head out to Morpeth in Northumberland, where family treasures brought along for evaluation include a richly engraved glass vase, a pre-war tin-plated Mickey Mouse, two fine paintings of Venice, and a charming old love token.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Antiques featured in this programme from Llanelli in Wales include two Minton Majolica urns left by an impoverished naval captain, a brass monocular microscope, and an old collection of comics.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: In the historic Lincolnshire town Grantham (birthplace of Margaret Thatcher), finds include two letters from CS Lewis, a valuable opal necklace, and a selection of Edwardian silk stockings.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow

programme.desc: A prison break gone awry finds Mitch held hostage by a beautiful woman and forced to perform surgery on her escaped convict husband. Meanwhile, Matt and Slade decide to settle their mutual affection for Summer in a daring surfing contest.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: Mitch removes a bullet from an escaped convict, only to realize that he and his wife have every intention of killing him. Stephanie's sister Caroline arrives with her fiancé, who becomes the target of an attempted murder.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Dan & Teresa say identical twin sons, Dallas & Drew, 16, are violent, destructive & dangerous. What's at the root of the teens' anger & extreme jealousy? Dr. Phil examines the jealousy & torment driving these siblings apart & throwing the home into chaos.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Have you ever looked in the mirror and thought, "If I could lose five more pounds, I'd be perfect"? Darlene and Jennifer have been starving themselves in the name of perfection, but are they also killing themselves on their quest?

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Shelby wants to find the truth about her dad's online relationship with a woman he's never met. Dad David says "Maria" has a $10 million inheritance and says he knows for a fact that "Maria" is a real person and he can't wait to introduce her one day.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Self-proclaimed "fat guy" Eric was 560 lbs, so he decided to go on an epic bike ride across America. His goals were to lose weight, write a book & repair his relationship with his wife. His story went viral, as critics said Eric was scamming America.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Dr. Phil continues with the family of Amy, "Mother God", who says she can heal the world with her group, Love Has Won. The family alleges that Amy is a brainwashed "cult leader" and she is putting other people's lives at risk. Pt. 2

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Dr. Phil deals with several important issues about the body: conquering erectile dysfunction, taming a fitness obsession, and beating blushing.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: In a bizarre abuse case, Gypsy Rose Blanchard's mother forced her to pretend she was ill, undergo countless surgeries, shave her head, insert a feeding tube & use a wheelchair. A web of deceit & torture led to murder. Gypsy Rose talks with Dr. Phil.Pt. 1

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Trisha & Danielle are angry with dad, Ron, who they say abandoned their dying mother, his wife of 30 yrs, to plan a wedding with a Kennedy heiress he met online. His daughters say "Misty Kennedy" is a catfish. Ron says "Misty" is the love of his life.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Kathi says son, Nico, 14, plays video games all day & charged thousands buying tokens. Nico attended only six days of school this year & when disciplined, Nico rages, curses & terrorizes. Kathi says he learned this behavior from his dad, Evo; Evo agrees.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Dr. Phil continues his work with a family ripped apart by accusations of child molestation. Father Jason agrees to take a polygraph test to prove his innocence. Tune in to find out the results and what's next for this family!

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Aja says she is tired of caring for her entitled, drug-addicted mother, Janet, by allowing her to live with her for 8 of 10 years of her own marriage. Aja cites costs of $100,000. Janet rejects: she pays rent & regularly goes to Narcotics Anonymous.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Caylee Anthony's image has been splashed across magazine covers and TV screens in an effort to find the missing 3-year-old. With the bizarre twists and turns in this story, Dr. Phil's panel of experts probe into the case that has captivated millions.

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Binge drinking has increasingly become a way of life and death on college campuses. Dr. Phil talks to two 20-somethings who admit to binge drinking regularly, but say they are not alcoholics. Will one family's painful loss convince these two to sober up?

programme.title: Dr. Phil
programme.desc: Dustin, Chance & Nova say mom Sonya, is a liar & manipulator, neglecting them--deplorable conditions, no food, no hot water. They say mom bought fast food for herself & her boyfriend as they starved. Then she disappeared. Sonya says she doesn't remember.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show

programme.desc: CBS Mornings Co-Hosts Gayle King, Tony Dokoupil and Nate Burleson join Drew and Ross Mathews at the news desk breaking down everything.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show

programme.desc: Bel-Air" star Jabari Banks is joining Drew to chat about his show. Drew and her co-pilot Ross Mathews are serving the news sunny-side up in an all-new Drew's News.

programme.desc: The hosts of "The Talk" Natalie Morales, Jerry O'Connell, Sheryl Underwood, Akbar Gbaja-Biamila and Amanda Kloots are joining Drew and taking on the final five to answer rapid fire questions about themselves!

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: It's an all-new Drewber, when actress and entrepreneur Cameron Diaz joins Drew in her minivan to chat while cruising around NYC. Then, Chef Pilar Valdes is sharing her delicious makeover recipe for one of the most common fridge leftovers, rice!

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show

programme.desc: Kristina Zias talks nostalgic fashion trends and wedding etiquette with Drew & Ross Mathews. Brendan Fraser's comeback and scientific reasons behind listening to sad songs on Drew's News.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: Shotgun Wedding" star D'Arcy Carden is joining Drew and Ross Mathews at the news desk to cover today's hottest stories like the woman who invited all her ex-boyfriends to her wedding and put them at a table together and the newest trend of eating alone.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show

programme.desc: Drew and Bill Nye The Science Guy are serving the news sunny-side up in an all new Drew's News. Then, Chef Pilar Valdes reveals five essential pantry items and turns them into a delicious dish.

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show

programme.title: The Drew Barrymore Show
programme.desc: The Equalizer" star Queen Latifah stops by to chat. Plus, Drew and Ross Mathews are serving the news sunny-side up in an all new Drew's News. Then, In A Minute Ross is sharing an all new delicious Rossipe.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Mr. Brewster, the oil man who made Jed a multi-millionaire, arrives in Beverly Hills with his wife planning to build their dream house. Jed and Granny think they have the perfect house in mind for their dream home.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Granny is determined to go back home even if she has to walk back all by herself. When she reaches Las Vegas she has second thoughts. Jethro gets arrested by an undercover cop.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Mrs. Drysdale thinks she has a new way of getting rid of the Clampetts: talk Jed into donating their mansion to the city for an art museum. They agree, on the assumption that they are supposed to provide the artworks and not move out.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Granny confuses Mrs. Drysdale's forays into astrology with the practice of black magic. An intended gift for Ellie Mae from Mr. Drysdale only adds to the confusion.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Jethro is anxious to become a new "Double Naught" spy and Mr. Drysdale gives him his own office. A bank robber hopes to con an unwitting Jethro into helping him get into the bank vault.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: When the Clampetts decide they want to go home for Possum Day, Mr. Drysdale attempts to put together a Possum Day in Beverly Hills.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Jethro thinks the Drysdale's young attractive maid is interested in him. He commences to courting her but she is actually interested in watching the football game on the Clampett's color TV.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: The Clampetts (thereafter Mr. Drysdale) mistake the new neighbor's maidservant for the actual owner. Granny tries her best to set Jed up with her.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Granny's concocts a love potion for Elly Mae at the same time Mr. Drysdale hires an escort for Elly. Dean arrives at the mansion with the Clampetts believing he's Miss Jane's boyfriend so Granny tries a reverse spell.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: The Clampetts (thereafter Mr. Drysdale) mistake the new neighbor's maidservant for the actual owner. Granny tries her best to set Jed up with her.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Mr. Lucas Sebastian, a billionaire entrepreneur, wants Jed to invest in his new venture, undersea farming.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Mr. Farquar, Mrs. Drysdale's father comes for a visit. When he's alone with Drysdale, he reveals he's broke. It seems on his way over, he passed through Las Vegas and lost his whole fortune and is asking Drysdale for a handout, which he refuses.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Daddy Farquhar continues to visit the Clampetts' mansion to his daughter Margaret's displeasure. He has plans for Granny and her money in Las Vegas but she's expecting a marriage proposal.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Jethro wants to be a general and Mr. Drysdale decides the safest idea is to get him into a boys military academy. With Jethro twice the size of the other boys, the commander has his doubts while a mock battle confuses Granny and Jed.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: When Mr. Drysdale is unhappy with Dr. Clyburn's treatment of his cold the Clampetts hear about it. Granny decides it's time to set up practice and enlists the rest of her family to help. She also claims a cure for the common cold.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: The world's richest woman wants to buy the Clampett mansion and will stop at nothing to get it. Will Jed finally sell?

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Granny wants to learn to drive the truck but can't get used to modern day contraptions. A horse is more of what she wants and Mr. Drysdale gets her one, a professional race horse.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: When Granny hears the Drysdales are at a horse show, she declares she wants good trotter so she can ride it to the market. When Mr. Drysdale buys a racer along with a buggy, Granny decides she wants to be the driver at the track.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Granny encounters an ostrich at the Drysdales and believe it's a giant chicken. She decides it got into her "medicinal tonic" and that's why it's so big. She tries to apply the idea to her vegetables.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: The Clampetts believe resuming his courtship of Elly is why Sonny Drysdale returns. His stepfather arranges a job as a beauty product salesman and his sixth stop at the Clampetts is where his merchandise is mistaken as courting gifts.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Granny, along with Elly, is heading back to the hills to do some doctoring. Mr. Drysdale is frantic to stop her so he reveals that the Brewsters are having a baby. Jethro brings home some girls from the Kit Kat Club so he won't be lonely.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: A shady magician sells his wares to the gullible Jethro.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Jed thinks Granny needs help in cleaning the mansion, but she believes it's because he wants to put her in a retirement home, so Granny is ready to head to the hills with her money, which Mr. Drysdale is desperate to avoid.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Jethro is bent on becoming an astronaut but gets sidetracked into teaming up with Miss Jane to become a folk singer. Along the way, Jethro invents a new musical device he dubs the Bodine o' phone.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Drysdale, at first irate that beautiful actress Bergstrom is kept on an expensive stipend without making a film, is smitten at first sight and so places the actress in the Clampett home to learn backwoods accents and ways for a movie.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Jethro becomes a Hugh Hefner wannabe when he discovers some Playpen magazines in Mr. Drysdale's garage.

programme.title: The Beverly Hillbillies
programme.desc: Granny remains eager to get Elly to the altar and decides Professor Biddle, Miss Jane's friend, will do. Mr. Drysdale blackmails Dash into asking the Clampett lass for a date. The meek birdwatcher and the handsome actor are soon at odds.

programme.title: Beverly Hills 90210
programme.desc: (S01E006) An unreasonable teacher makes Brandon's life miserable by giving him no grade higher than a C.

programme.title: Beverly Hills 90210
programme.desc: (S01E007) "Delusions of glamour" overcome Brenda when she meets Kelly's beautiful mother Jackie, a former model.

programme.title: Beverly Hills 90210
programme.desc: (S01E008) The Walsh parents examine their relationship while Brenda and Brandon examine theirs, as they get involved in a UCLA study on twins.

programme.title: Beverly Hills 90210
programme.desc: (S01E009) Sympathy and responsibility are at odds when Brenda volunteers for a teen crisis hotline.

programme.title: Beverly Hills 90210
programme.desc: (S01E010) The chemistry between Brenda and Dylan starts to heat up when Brenda accidentally catches him in the shower, then comforts him after he fights with his father.

programme.title: Beverly Hills 90210
programme.desc: (S01E011) Both Walsh twins face the temptation to drink alcohol when their peers are doing it all around them.

programme.title: Beverly Hills 90210
programme.desc: (S01E012) Brandon gets an unexpected taste of fatherhood when he asks his classmate Melissa for a date-then has to baby-sit her infant son while she has a college interview.

programme.title: Beverly Hills 90210
programme.desc: (S01E013) Pillow talk threatens to destroy Brenda's sleep-over as all the girls share their deepest secrets, with unexpected results.

programme.title: Beverly Hills 90210
programme.desc: (S01E014) The Walsh's agree to let their maid's niece, Carla, use their address to enroll at West Beverly.

programme.title: Beverly Hills 90210
programme.desc: (S01E015) A weekend in Palm Springs goes awry when David invites Steve, Kelly and Donna to join him at his grandparents' house while they're away on a cruise-but he gets the dates confused, and they're still there.

programme.title: Beverly Hills 90210
programme.desc: (S01E016) Brandon is "discovered" when he's out roller-blading, landing a role as an emergency extra on a big TV show.

programme.title: Beverly Hills 90210
programme.desc: (S01E017) Brenda's had it with home life and West Beverly and decides to leave both for the real world.

programme.title: Beverly Hills 90210
programme.desc: (S01E018) The Walsh twins and all their friends are panicked by the upcoming SATs, but then everything gets put in perspective when Brenda finds a lump in her breast and faces a test no one can prepare for.

programme.title: Beverly Hills 90210
programme.desc: (S01E019) Brandon interviews a classmate, Roger, who's an outstanding athlete and student--and haunted by the overbearing success of his father.

programme.title: Big Brother
programme.desc: Who will win the Power of Veto, and will the plan to get Cameron on the block succeed?

programme.title: Big Brother
programme.desc: Will Cameron finally be evicted from the House? Who will follow? A terrifying Double Eviction kicks off Scary Week, a full week of gameplay and one night of fright. Plus, a scary ending that will send shivers down the spines of all who survive.

programme.title: Big Brother
programme.desc: Jared and Cameron return from the grave as BB zombies, how will the house react to this spine-tingling twist? Plus witness all the crazy drama you didn't see during the death-defying double.

programme.title: Big Brother
programme.desc: Which zombie will emerge from the Resurrection Rumble, with the power to put fate in his own hands? And who will have their game dead and buried for good?

programme.title: Big Brother
programme.desc: The game resumes with the final ten vying for the Head of Household. Who will win the power, and which two guests will be put on the chopping block?

programme.title: Big Brother
programme.desc: Will Felicia or Mecole's soul be saved at the Veto Competition? And will Cameron's target change to a bombshell backdoor?

programme.title: Big Brother
programme.desc: Will Cory be back-doored? Or will Felicia stay in the line of fire? And who will be the final Houseguest evicted before Jury begins? Plus, a new Head of Household will be crowned.

programme.title: Big Brother
programme.desc: For weeks, the DJ has been laying low, but what happens when she's in charge? And which houseguests will she throw on the barbie at nominations?

programme.title: Big Brother
programme.desc: Who will win the Power of Veto? And will it force Bowie Jane to choose a new target? Plus, Zingbot is back! What zings will he sling? And will the houseguests be left in tears from laughing or crying?

programme.title: Big Brother
programme.desc: Will the plan to backdoor Cameron come to fruition? And which houseguest will be the first sent to the jury house? Plus, what super surprises will be unleashed as comic week begins?

programme.title: Big Brother

programme.desc: Sky enlists the crew to help with her fashion show in L.A., Miss Kitty and Young Bae talk about their fight, Alex surprises Donna, and Tatiana reaches her breaking point.

programme.title: Black Ink Crew
programme.desc: Walt brings his new girlfriend by the shop, which causes Donna to catch a flashback. Young Bae and Rob face difficulties in their marriage. Sky is at a crossroads with her relationship with Des.

programme.desc: Kit's mom passes away in D.C and the news rocks the shop. Donna and Walt duke it out over Jessica. Puma hires new girl London and Bae thinks he has a shady, ulterior motive.

programme.title: Black Ink Crew

programme.title: Black Ink Crew
programme.desc: The crew continues their stay in Memphis to pay their respects to Kitty's mom. London decides to throw a house party to promote the brand down south. Walt prepares to take his relationship with Jessica to the next step.

programme.title: Black Ink Crew
programme.desc: Ceaser has a new opportunity to expand Black Ink but not everyone is happy with the deal, leaving him to question where loyalties lie. Donna plans a girls' night that's full of rowdy surprises. Walt and Jess can't see eye to eye.

programme.title: Black Ink Crew
programme.desc: An unexpected drug test has Tati freaking out. Sky announces a huge surprise. Quani makes a decision that shocks Puma. Rok airs out his dirty laundry - literally. And problems with the Brooklyn shop puts Ceaser on a collision course with the police.

programme.title: Hangin' With Mr. Cooper

programme.title: Eve
programme.desc: Nick becomes upset because Shelly is always at the apartment he shares with her boyfriend, J.T. Shelly eats the guys' food and generally interrupts their manly pursuits, but J.T. doesn't mind.

programme.title: Eve
programme.desc: Shelly's college friend, April unexpectedly arrives in Miami. The duo's late-night partying causes Shelly to get into a huge fight at work with Rita and Janie after they are left outside a club with hip-hop artist Jadakiss.

programme.title: Gameday Scoreboard & Highlights
programme.desc: CBS Sports HQ keeps you completely up to speed with highlights, top stories and in-game updates.

programme.title: Scoreboard Final
programme.desc: CBS Sports HQ analysts break down the day's top stories and highlights.

programme.title: Scoreboard Final
programme.desc: CBS Sports HQ analysts break down the day's top stories and highlights.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: Cuando asesinan a una mujer en una pequeña ciudad de Florida, habitada enteramente por delincuentes sexuales, La UAC se enfrenta a una comunidad repleta de sospechosos. Además, Lewis tiene una oportunidad profesional que puede llevarla lejos de la UAC.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: La UAC ayuda a la hija periodista de Rossi, Joy (Amber Stevens West), a investigar la desaparición de una alumna de la universidad.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval
programme.desc: Gibbs se une al Agente Fornell del FBI para investigar su intento de asesinato. Pero terminan enfrentando una situación inesperada cuando la ex esposa de ambos se involucra.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval
programme.desc: Es Navidad y Tony DiNozzo no sabe si ser desagradable o bueno cuando su papa, Anthony DiNozzo padre llega de visita.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval
programme.desc: Mientras el equipo de NCIS investiga una conexión entre la muerte de un periodista y un oficial Naval, Ziva recibe una sorpresiva visita de su padre, a quien no vió en más de dos años.

programme.title: NCIS: Criminología Naval
programme.desc: Luego de un evento que acontece cerca de casa, el equipo de NCIS se une para buscar respuestas y pedir justicia en pos de proteger a los colegas más vulnerables.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): Las banderas de nuestros padres
programme.desc: Danny es interrogado por el investigador del fiscal de distrito cuando su expareja es acusada de colocar pruebas para cerrar un caso de homicidio.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): Maldito
programme.desc: Cuando un mafioso local es asesinado a tiros en su auto, Danny y Báez intentan obtener información del chico de los recados de bajo nivel de la mafia que encuentran atado en el maletero antes de que la pandilla tome represalias.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): Viejos tiempos
programme.desc: Cuando el primer socio de Frank anuncia sus planes de publicar un libro lleno de historias de sus primeros días en la policía, a Frank le preocupa que sus historias personales se hagan públicas.

programme.title: Blue Bloods (en español): A sangre fría
programme.desc: Cuando un teniente de la policía de Nueva York, recientemente retirado y bien considerado, es acusado de disparar a un grupo de posibles asaltantes en el metro y posteriormente desaparece, Frank debe enfrentar las consecuencias.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: La UAC ayuda a la hija periodista de Rossi, Joy (Amber Stevens West), a investigar la desaparición de una alumna de la universidad.

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: La UAC está persiguiendo a un sospechoso en Phoenix que está secuestrando víctimas con insomnio. Además, Hotch y García se enfrentan a la amenaza del grupo de sicarios clandestinos, llamados“La docena sucia.”

programme.title: Mentes criminales
programme.desc: Tras la muerte de dos agentes encubiertos de la DEA y la desaparición de un tercero, el UAC se suma a la NSA para investigar si una red clandestina de drogas por Internet está involucrada.

programme.title: Mentes criminales

programme.title: Music City
programme.desc: On the season finale, Rachyl and Kerry make a big decision about their future, and Jackson comes to a realization about Jessica (and his music) after Savana's ultimatum.

programme.title: Party Down South
programme.desc: The gang goes bar hopping on their last night at the house, Daddy is even more confused about Lil Bit, Mattie crosses the line, Lyle becomes defensive, and Lil Bit gets bold.

programme.title: Party Down South
programme.desc: As the roommates arrive in Biloxi, Mississippi for another wild vacation, they quickly realize they're a Lil' Bit short of eight people. But the party must go on, especially for Daddy, who pursues not one, but two of his roommates.

programme.title: Party Down South
programme.desc: Hott Dogg is getting all the attention (and the other girls are jealous), and Daddy tries asking out every girl in the house.

programme.title: Party Down South
programme.desc: The gang gets drunk and trashes a restaurant to celebrate Lyle's birthday, the Louisianimals start their new jobs, and Hott Dogg proves that she can party.

programme.title: Party Down South
programme.desc: Hott Dogg tries to fix her problems with the girls by making dinner, and Daddy can't hear Lil Bit's name without getting emotional, which sets Tiffany off.

programme.title: Party Down South
programme.desc: Daddy has many apologies to make after a drunken outburst, Hott Dogg joins Tiffany and Lauren for a girls' day, and Murray pulls a prank while everyone is out of the house.

programme.title: Party Down South
programme.desc: Walt hopes to get lucky with one of Lauren's friends, Hott Dogg worries that Daddy will never get over Lil Bit, and Mattie is insulted after Murray pays her bar tab.

programme.title: Party Down South
programme.desc: Everyone meets Mattie's angry alter ego Martha, and the boys try to take Daddy out for a guys' night to get his mind off Hott Dogg, which completely backfires.

programme.title: Party Down South
programme.desc: Daddy and Hott Dogg can't seem to get back to normal after she sees that he's not ready for anything serious, and the gang heads down to Louisiana to see their parents.

programme.title: My Big Redneck Family
programme.desc: Michelle deals with Jared's friend overstaying his welcome while Chris and Aimee face a moral dilemma with Morgan. Doug and Wendy have their hands full with Presley who has started mimicking what they say...cursing included!

programme.title: My Big Redneck Family
programme.desc: Doug takes a leap of faith and tries dance lessons with Wendy while Jared is faced with a cultural clash at his new temp job, and Christian is having girl problems.

programme.title: My Big Redneck Family
programme.desc: Doug and Wendy meet with a marriage counselor who assigns them intimacy "homework", Tammy and Tommy go on a juice cleanse and the family takes an IQ test to find out who's the smartest one.

programme.title: My Big Redneck Family
programme.desc: Jared and Tommy get some quality guy time in but it may be a little too much for Jared to handle. Chris finds out that Christian has a boyfriend and invites him over for a family barbeque.

programme.title: My Big Redneck Family
programme.desc: Chris is at war with some teenage kids who are tearing up his lawn while Jared panics after pawning Michelle's grandmother's necklace. Tommy is worried that Hunter is growing up too fast and Doug questions Wendy's sexuality.

programme.title: My Big Redneck Family
programme.desc: Doug does some retail therapy and makes a very expensive purchase that doesn't go over too well with Wendy. Jared is determined to have a pool in his backyard and Tommy & Tammy host a couple of fans at their house for the weekend.

programme.title: My Big Redneck Family
programme.desc: Chris and Aimee face a big challenge by trying to bond with their kids while Doug can't recall the crazy night he and Wendy had at the bar. Jared befriends a blind man and tests what it's like to be blind for 24 hours.

programme.title: My Big Redneck Family
programme.desc: Brody loses a tooth but when the tooth fairy fails to deliver, Doug has to step up to the plate. Michelle leaves for a night and leaves a desperate Jared on diaper duty while Aimee tries to convince Chris to marry her.

programme.title: My Big Redneck Family
programme.desc: The guys try to toughen up Mason and Brody's survival skills while Tommy has his acting debut in his first film.

programme.title: My Big Redneck Family
programme.desc: Jared finishes his last temp job before hunting scene and finally changes a diaper. Tammy and Tommy experiment in the bedroom, and Doug may finally get some action the bedroom.

programme.title: My Big Redneck Family
programme.desc: The Clampets are settled back home and facing a whole new set of challenges. Mason has found young love and is putting Chris and Aimee's parenting skills to the test.

programme.title: My Big Redneck Family
programme.desc: There's a wedding going on at Chris and Aimee's and you are not going to believe who's it is! Doug and Wendy are newly separated, and Jared has a new money making venture.

programme.title: Steve Austin's Broken Skull Challenge
programme.desc: Steve Austin invites eight badasses in the country to battle head to head on his ranch. The last man standing takes on the Skullbuster obstacle course for a chance to win $10,000.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Stop sticks are deployed to intercept a vehicle with bullets. Two suspects watch their life unravel after being found with meth. Police assist young and restless runaways.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Following a brief pursuit, the desperate driver bails out of the vehicle and flees on foot. An officer responds to an assault call. When a dog owner returns home, she's informed of her dog's mayhem and given a verbal warning and citation.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: An Oklahoma man's effort to evade units goes up in flames, officers use a beanbag gun on an armed suspect, and deputies intervene in a couple's grocery dispute.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: An Officer attempts to pull over a car which leads to a high speed pursuit. An Officer encounters an apartment fire. A man is hit by a vehicle in a trailer park.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A disturbed naked man is spotted in a park covered in blood. Officers find a nude couple in a U-Haul truck. A traffic stop over a minor violation turns into a dangerous pursuit.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A man pulls out all the stops to elude the police, a civilian steps in when she spots a violent crime in progress, and a suspected shoplifter is confronted by officers.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A cyclist takes flight, police find a woman at the wheel of a stolen truck, and officers roll up on a couple smoking meth while their four-year-old is in the car with them.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: When one of the officers attempts to grab a suspect, the suspect unexpectedly assaults the officer in an attempt to avoid arrest. An officer responds to a stabbing. An officer is flagged down by a concerned group looking for a missing child.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A wanted man sprints across a freeway to evade police, a woman is arrested for breaking her friend's windows, and a driver tries to talk his way out of a road rage arrest.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: An intoxicated man suspected of domestic abuse refuses to obey deputies' orders, police find drugs in a woman's car, and an alleged prostitute encounters the police.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A wanted woman gives deputies a fake name, but her brother accidentally reveals the truth, and two officers respond to a domestic dispute.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A man hands police his gun unannounced, an oblivious suspect tries to make money ripping off two detectives, and a driver's inability to do simple math lands her in hot water.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: The threat of a tasing is enough to slow a fleeing suspect, a heated argument between girlfriends leads to vehicular assault, and a man with weed in his car has no poker face.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A lawbreaker tries to convince the cops that he's a good guy, and deputies smell trouble during a traffic stop.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: An officer tracks a suspect down a treacherous cliffside, a man puts his brother and elderly father at risk, and a man asks police to take his son to jail.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A convenience store sprinter bets officers he'll get away next time, matching bullets help solve an armed robbery, and a trucker takes his family on a supersized car chase.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A Special Operations Unit coordinates a city-wide “buy bust” sting designed to apprehend street level drug dealers. Officers join units in pursuit of a stolen SUV. An officer arrests two brothers for public intoxication.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A wild-eyed man leads police on a chase that ends in a Tasing, officers respond to an in-progress lovers' spat, and a traffic stop results in drug and auto theft charges.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A traffic stop takes a surprising turn when a suspect creates a spur-of-the-moment diversion, and a soft-spoken driver has difficulty being upfront with the officers.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A first-time offender brings officers on an intense car chase, deputies respond to an armed robbery, and a routine traffic stop ends in multiple arrests.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A suspect collides with another driver while fleeing from police, deputies mediate an altercation over a bag of chips, and officers respond to a domestic dispute.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Officers subdue a mentally unwell man, a driver is arrested for crystal meth possession after his passengers incriminate him, and an arrested suspect apologizes to his son.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A fleet-footed deputy nabs a suspect on the run, officers responding to a domestic call are refused entry, and police try to ascertain the cause of a woman's hallucinations.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: A man caught shoplifting gets an earful from his fed-up mom, police use surveillance video to track down an armed robber, and deputies oversee a contentious custody exchange.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Police pursue a stolen motorcycle that turns into a foot chase. A domestic violence call results in the arrest of an abusive stepdad. Officers respond after a fight over cigarettes escalate.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Deputies are led on a chase by a driver they pursued just weeks earlier, and a man caught with drugs tries to pin the blame on his girlfriend.

programme.title: COPS
programme.desc: Watching football turns a couple against each other, a cop gets fed up with a repeat shoplifter, and a man tries to swallow a bag of marijuana before officers find it.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Catherine's testimony in court is not enough to convict a killer suspected of murdering his own mother. Adam Novak, with whom Catherine had a brief romantic encounter, is the lawyer who represents the killer and secures his freedom.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: The lead suspect for the high-profile murder of anti-drug crusading assemblyman Danilo Zamesca is Thomas Simon, the west coast's biggest drug supplier.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: As Catherine and Keppler begin to investigate the murder of a teen-aged Jane Doe, both agree that the killer, who was meticulous in removing evidence from the body and its surrounding area, is likely a repeat offender.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: A case involving a man's torched corpse whose bones and tissues had been harvested leads Nick and Keppler into the disturbing world of illegally sold human body parts.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Grissom returns from his teaching sabbatical as new member of the team, Michael Keppler desperately tries to keep his dark past hidden from his colleagues.

programme.title: En el tiempo de las mariposas
programme.desc: En el tiempo de las mariposas es una novela de la escritora dominicana Julia Álvarez, publicada en 1994, sobre la historia de las hermanas Mirabal.

programme.title: ¡Agáchate, maldito!
programme.desc: Un desenlace explosivo aguarda a un terrorista irlandés (James Coburn) obsesionado con la dinamita que se alía con un campesino mexicano convertido en revolucionario (Rod Steiger) en este trepidante relato de poder y política.

programme.title: Llega un jinete libre y salvaje
programme.desc: En el Viejo Oeste de los años 40, dos ganaderos de poca monta se alían para hacer frente a los estragos de un terrateniente despiadado que pretende ampliar su imperio a cualquier precio. Protagonizada por Jane Fonda, James Caan y Jason Robards.

programme.title: En el tiempo de las mariposas
programme.desc: En el tiempo de las mariposas es una novela de la escritora dominicana Julia Álvarez, publicada en 1994, sobre la historia de las hermanas Mirabal.

programme.title: La loca
programme.desc: Un joven psiquiatra se interesa en el caso de una paciente que cree vivir en el año 1936. Los parientes de ella quieren hacerla pasar por sana para poder cobrar una herencia, pero el médico lucha contra toda la familia para defender a 'La loca'.

programme.title: Juan Colorado
programme.desc: El norteño Juan, se enamora de la machorra Silvia, pero, su padre la quiere casar con un tal Rafael, el cual por celos y envidia, se une al padre de Silvia, para acabar con Juan. Ella al darse cuenta de lo que sucede, se viste como Juan para salvarlo.

programme.title: Desde mi cielo
programme.desc: Cuando asesinan a la adolescente de 14 años Susie Salmon, ella deja atrás una vida inconclusa. Ahora, desde su lugar en un extraño pero hermoso mundo intermedio, ella debe ayudar a su padre a atrapar a su asesino.

programme.title: ¡Madre!
programme.desc: Jennifer Lawrence y Javier Bardem ofrecen actuaciones inolvidables en ¡Madre!, el elogiado trabajo de Darren Aronofsky. ¡Experimenta el suspenso psicológico visualmente deslumbrante que dejará tu corazón latiendo y te volará la cabeza!

programme.title: Tan distinto como yo
programme.desc: Del éxito de ventas del NY Times llega una historia inspiradora y verdadera sobre dos hombres de orígenes radicalmente opuestos, que desarrollan un sorprendente vínculo que los llevará al viaje más notable de sus vidas y forjará una amistad eterna.

programme.title: Un plan sencillo
programme.desc: Dos hermanos encuentran cuatro millones de dólares en una avioneta caída e intentan quedarse con el dinero, pero la paranoia, la codicia y el miedo a ser capturado hacen que su plan esté fuera de control, con consecuencias desastrosas.

programme.title: East LA Interchange
programme.desc: East LA Interchange follows the evolution of working-class, immigrant Boyle Heights from multicultural to predominantly Latino and a center of Mexican-American culture.

programme.title: The Lookout
programme.desc: Chris "Slapshot" Pratt (Joseph Gordon-Levitt), cuyo brillante futuro fue cortado por un accidente, es un conserje nocturno en un banco. Solitario y frustrado, Chris cae en las garras de un estafador y lo ayuda a robar el banco donde trabaja.

programme.title: La hija del general
programme.desc: Existe la forma correcta, la forma equivocada y la forma del ejército. Pero bajo ninguna circunstancia, el investigador militar Paul Brenner ayudará a los oficiales de Fort MacCallum a encubrir el motivo de la muerte de una hermosa oficial.

programme.title: Las estafadoras
programme.desc: Una mujer y su hija son estafadoras profesionales que utilizan sus armas de seducción para engañar a millonarios, hasta que la joven hija se enamora poniendo en apuros el último golpe: un excéntrico magnate del tabaco.

programme.title: Los tuyos, los míos, y los nuestros
programme.desc: Un almirante viudo de la Guardia costera y una viuda diseñadora de bolsos se enamoran y se casan, para la consternación de sus hijos, ocho de él y diez de ella.

programme.title: Legalmente rubias
programme.desc: Cuando dos primas británicas se mudan a Los Ángeles, se dan cuenta que para triunfar en la secundaria deben demostrar que las rubias no sólo se divierten más, sino que son más listas.

programme.title: Sólo una noche
programme.desc: La historia de un matrimonio que se enfrenta a la tentación que puede decidir su futuro cuando se encuentran separados durante una sola noche.

programme.title: Las Aparicio: La película
programme.desc: La exitosa serie “Las Aparicio” se traduce al cine y narra la historia de una familia de mujeres, pero; víctimas de una maldición, son viudas y no pueden concebir niños varones, por lo que deben unirse para resolver el secreto detrás de su viejo hogar.

programme.title: En nombre del amor
programme.desc: De Nicholas Sparks, el autor best-seller, llega esta conmovedora historia sobre hasta dónde estamos dispuestos a llegar para mantener viva la esperanza del amor.

programme.title: The Curious Case Of Benjamin Button
programme.desc: Brad Pitt y Cate Blanchett protagonizan esta adaptación de la historia de F. Scott Fitzgerald acerca de un anciano que va rejuveneciendo y los problemas que surgen cuando se enamora de una mujer.

programme.title: Enemigo al acecho
programme.desc: Dos francotiradores, uno ruso y uno alemán, juegan al gato y el ratón durante la Batalla de Stalingrado.

programme.title: El gran rescate
programme.desc: En medio de la Segunda Guerra Mundial, el Batallón nro. 6 de exploradores recibe una misión de proporciones heroicas: ir 50 kilómetros tras las líneas enemigas y liberar a más de 500 prisioneros de guerra estadounidenses.

programme.title: Rescate al amanecer

programme.title: Enemigo al acecho
programme.desc: Dos francotiradores, uno ruso y uno alemán, juegan al gato y el ratón durante la Batalla de Stalingrado.

programme.title: Una mujer sin filtro
programme.desc: Paz, una amable mujer, permitió que todos alrededor de ella la trataran como si no fuera nada, manteniendo el silencio para no herir ningún sentimiento. Hasta que un día, un fenómeno fuerza su cabeza a expresar lo que siente.

programme.title: Veneno

programme.title: Supernova: el fin del universo

programme.desc: En 2047, un equipo de astronautas se embarca en una misión para recuperar una nave espacial. Sin embargo, esta simple tarea los conducirá a algo mucho más aterrador de lo que imaginaban.

programme.title: Supernova: el fin del universo
programme.desc: En los confines del espacio, la tripulación de una nave desvelará un secreto antes de que una supernova haga estallar la galaxia. James Spader, Angela Bassett, Peter Facinelli y Robert Forster protagonizan este thriller de ciencia ficción.

programme.title: Darkness

programme.title: Norbit
programme.desc: Murphy protagoniza a un Norbit apacible, que recibe una segunda oportunidad con el amor de su infancia, Kate. Sin embargo, los obstáculos podrían complicar este romance más de lo esperado.

programme.title: South Pacific
programme.desc: On a South Pacific island during World War II, love blooms between a young nurse and a secretive Frenchman who's being courted for a dangerous military mission.

programme.title: West Side Story

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: Someone has stolen $300 from Mr. Drucker's general store, and it looks like Eb is the culprit. How else could he have bought himself a new car that cost, you guessed it, exactly $300? But that is just the first twist of the many turns of this story.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: Lisa's dreams come true, and so do Oliver's nightmares, when Eb discovers a runaway boy sleeping in the hay in their barn. Lisa is only too excited about the idea of having the sounds of platters of little feet around the house.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: Arnold, the Ziffels' television-loving pig, has taken on a paper route to save enough money for a new color set. But when bank robbers show up and threaten his dreams, and Lisa and Oliver are held captive in their own home, Arnold has to fight back.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: The farmers of Hooterville are headed to France! Or at least they are if they can get organized. As part of an agricultural exchange program, the farmers are offered a chance to join a chartered government flight to Europe.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: Love is in the air as the first day of spring arrives in Hooterville. And who better to lead the town in celebrating it than Lisa. She is resolved to show Oliver just what spring is all about and sets out to produce a Spring festival celebration.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: It's a hair-raising episode as Eb (Tom Lester) enrolls in a correspondence course to become a barber. Lisa (Eva Gabor) and Oliver (Eddie Albert) give him the money to learn the trade but learning how to cut hair by mail has its glitches.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: For a lawyer, Oliver should be more careful about what he signs. Lisa reminds him that two years ago Oliver made her a promise to take her back to New York for a two-week vacation. And she has it in writing… on the bottom of the kitchen drawer.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: It's hard to know who has a curse over Oliver, but he sure has his hands full with Lisa and her fellow Hungarian Lazlo Broslav. Lazlo appears with a letter claiming he once saved the life of Lisa's uncle, and now her family must repay the debt.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: There's a problem in Hooterville: no farmer seems able to grow a cash crop on account of the quality of the soil. But as it turns out from Oliver's (Eddie Albert) soil and mineral research, the oft-misunderstood rutabaga is an ideal choice.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: Green Acres goes Hollywood in this first installment of a two-part season finale. When Arnold the pig appears in a play at the Hooterville Theater, Lisa (Eva Gabor) arranges for an old friend to give Arnold a chance on the big screen.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: It's a swine-sational third season finale for Green Acres, as Oliver and Lisa chaperone Arnold, the Ziffel's talented pig, to Hollywood for his big-screen test. There's only one problem, Lisa failed to mention that Arnold is not your normal actor.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: Hooterville is abuzz as the townsfolk enter a contest sponsored by Peterson's Poi Juice, with a trip to Hawaii as the top prize. But no one expects the winner to be Arnold, the Ziffels' talented pig. Maybe a pig might fly after all, to the islands!

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: A charity rummage sale asks for donated clothing. Being among the wealthier residents of Hooterville, the organizers look to the Douglases. It isn't long before Oliver has to stop Lisa from giving away his entire wardrobe!

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: Love is in the air when Eb is quickly engaged to Loreli Appleby, whom he has only known for a day. Eb tries to impress Loreli's father, a farmer, but in typical fashion, he accidentally ruins his future father-in-law's cabbage crop.

programme.title: Green Acres
programme.desc: When Fire Chief Joe Carson is looking for a way to go to Miami, he hires Oliver as his assistant, hoping Oliver will pay for the trip. The plan backfires, no pun intended, when Oliver starts pointing out what a poor job the chief has been doing.

programme.title: Taxi
programme.desc: Alex tells Elaine that her hectic schedule of being a mother, a cabbie and a museum employee is driving her crazy and that she should see a psychiatrist. Elaine decides that a quicker cure would be to spend the night with Alex.

programme.title: Taxi
programme.desc: Bobby and Tony’s friendship is on the line when they become embroiled in a hilarious love triangle and attempt to outdo each other in vying for the affection of a beautiful young lady.

programme.title: Taxi
programme.desc: The overweight blind date Alex once had returned to the scene a svelte shell of her former self, and eager for the romance she yearns for with Alex

programme.title: Taxi
programme.desc: The riotous race of the century pits Alex against Louie in a winner-take-all bet to see who can bring in the most receipts. Lecherous Louie uses every dirty trick in the book to make sure he wins his prize—an evening with Elaine.

programme.title: Taxi
programme.desc: Elaine suddenly starts getting mysterious love letters. When she becomes intrigued by the poetic propositions, a couple of cabbies quickly claim responsibility, leaving Elaine with the hilarious task of discovering who is the amorous writer.

programme.title: Taxi
programme.desc: Louie makes a horrible first impression on girlfriend Zena’s parents on Taxi. Louie’s romance with girlfriend Zena takes an outrageous twist when she brings him home to meet her parents.

programme.title: Taxi
programme.desc: The cabbies try to make Tony a family man when they convince him to adopt the adorably precocious eight-year-old boy named Brian whom he befriended.

programme.title: Taxi
programme.desc: It’s a hilarious shock to the cabbies when Rev. Jim brings his new pet to the garage—an over-the-hill racehorse that he bought after cashing in on the 300-to-1 long shot. However, he soon finds that it’s impossible to housebreak a horse.

programme.title: The Odd Couple
programme.desc: Felix and Oscar spend a rainy weekend in the country looking for a lost girl

programme.title: The Odd Couple
programme.desc: Felix tries to make up with his divorced wife with a sentimental reminder of happier days.

programme.title: The Odd Couple
programme.desc: Oscar develops a strong attachment for Felix's doctor, an attractive young woman.

programme.title: The Odd Couple
programme.desc: Much to Oscar's disconfiture, Felix brings home an abandoned baby.

programme.title: Hawaii Five-0
programme.desc: Wrongly convicted man escapes prison to prove innocence after refusing parole. McGarrett's only clue: claim accepting parole would mean guilt admission.

programme.title: In The Heat Of The Night
programme.desc: Tibbs is convinced that the right man is in custody for the recent murder in the Bottoms of a cab driver. The initial evidence points to his suspect, but Gillespie has his doubts and asks Tibbs to consider that race may be a factor in his choice.

programme.title: In The Heat Of The Night
programme.desc: Sparta Councilperson Harriet DeLong’s sister, Natalie, is found murdered, and Chief Gillespie has a suspect in mind, but it happens to be the most powerful man in town, so he’s keeping it quiet as he builds a case, much to the frustration of Tibbs.

programme.title: In The Heat Of The Night
programme.desc: Harriet DeLong is determined to bring her sister Natalie's killer to justice and decides to try handling things on her own. Meanwhile, the murder of Jay Turkus causes Gillespie and Tibbs to concentrate on V.J. Trundel and his devious staff.

programme.title: In The Heat Of The Night
programme.desc: When an old friend and colleague apparently commits suicide, Virgil Tibbs travels to Philadelphia and uncovers corruption within the police force. Back in Sparta, Althea is close to giving birth, and Bubba is recruited to help with her Lamaze class.

programme.title: In The Heat Of The Night
programme.desc: Chief Gillespie travels to Philadelphia to help Virgil Tibbs, who was mistakenly arrested for the murder of a police officer who was helping him in his investigation. Together, Tibbs and Gillespie join forces to clear the name of Dwight Walker.

programme.title: In The Heat Of The Night
programme.desc: Raylyn Walker, a young prostitute and mother, is found murdered at a truck stop. The prime suspect is her last customer, Rocky, but he has an alibi. Tibbs is overwhelmed more by a visit with his in-laws, than by the birth of his newborn twins.

programme.title: Mannix
programme.desc: When three people are murdered all the evidence points to David Tate. A potential client approaches Intertect to prove Tate's innocence and Mannix decides to take the case.

programme.title: Mannix
programme.desc: Mannix and Wickersham feud over a case involving a laser ray and a dead agent.

programme.title: Mannix
programme.desc: Mannix quits Intertect when Wickersham accepts a case from a suspected gang boss and agrees to help a young woman instead. However, it turns out he may be working the same case.

programme.title: Mannix
programme.desc: Bernie Farmer opens a box that was entrusted to him by his brother-in-law, a mobster, but finds it empty. He recruits an unwilling Intertect to find out what was in the box.

programme.title: Mannix
programme.desc: Mannix is hired to investigate a supposed miracle but when a man turns up dead, Mannix begins to question the legitimacy of the miracle and sets out to find the truth.

programme.title: Mannix
programme.desc: A mystery writer, whose stories are based on real cases, finds a suicide note in his home that he supposedly wrote. Mannix tries to protect him but he insists on working the case.

programme.title: The Streets of San Francisco

programme.title: Boxing

programme.title: Boxing
programme.desc: Dmitry Bivol defends his WBA light-heavyweight title in a challenge against Craig Richards.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: Kelli and Judy must cut 10 girls to get to the magic number of 36 for the squad. Uniform Fittings gives Kelli a better idea of who has the whole package. As the cuts begin so does emotional end of dreams.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: As the girls get the DCC look, it helps some and not others. Two surprise guests stop by rehearsal and rock the DCC's world. Kelli has one of the most awkward office visits of all time.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: Cameos and Show Group auditions push the new girls and vets to their limits. Melissa Rycroft tries to save a DCC that's hanging by a thread and there is a shocking outcome from a Kelli office visit.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: Emotions are supercharged as Kelli & Judy make a lot of tough cuts to keep up the quality of the team. Melissa Rycroft offers invaluable field experience.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: Kelli finally announces the squad. Injuries threaten the opening of Cowboys training camp. Game Day chaos endangers a flawless performance.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: Hundreds of beautiful and talented hopefuls arrive to try out for the best cheerleading team in the world, while many of the returning girls are looking for redemption. New judges increase the pressure of moving on to Finals.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: Veterans fight for their jobs as new girls try to live their dreams and make DCC Training Camp. Standing in their way is; panel Interviews, solos, an exhausting dance combination and a room full of very tough judges.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: The new candidates' eyes are opened as they get a taste of what it is to be a DCC. As girls struggle to learn the dances, the reality of being "Big Time", sets in. Melissa Rycroft meets the new girls for the first time.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: With the first cut looming, the girls must push their dance skills to the limit. Melissa Rycroft works to bring out showmanship. Extra stress is added on Makeover day as the girls try to get the DCC look.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: A new choreographer shakes things up. The girls better start looking good because uniform fittings and the Belk fashion show are on the agenda. Surprises continue when two-time Grammy winner Kacey Musgraves, stops by rehearsal.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: Melissa Rycroft makes a house call to help Yuko. Kitty Carter rocks a few of the candidate's worlds. Cameos give Kelli & Judy a fresh perspective on the girls. At Show Group auditions, the girls let it all hang out.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: Kellie Pickler comes to a rehearsal to share her experience and motivate the girls as Training Camp is coming to an end. Melissa Rycroft makes Kelsey aware of a big mistake. Candace Romo helps with a big night of cuts.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: Squad announcement is bittersweet as some favorites go home. The team has their first appearance at the Star Ribbon cutting. Game Day is when dreams come true!

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: Hundreds of beautiful and talented women converge on AT&T Stadium to start the hardest audition process in professional sports, trying out for a coveted spot on the most famous NFL cheerleading squad in the world, the Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: With the field narrowed down to 119 women, the pressure is on. They must quickly learn a power pom routine and the famous kickline in order to perform it an hour later before the judges.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: The veterans finally enter the audition process. Now all 83 women are judged head to head during a panel interview, a solo dance performance and on their appearance on the football field as seen and the big screen.

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders: Making the Team
programme.desc: 44 women begin the very first training camp at the new 1 billion dollar Cowboys' facility, The Star. At the First Meeting, Kelli lays down the law and makes it clear that eight women will be sent home this summer.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: Mysterious deaths occur inside a traveling commune, starting an investigation that lasts more than a decade; two sisters -- former commune members -- reveal stories that involve lies, lust and greed.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: A college student is found murdered in a residential neighborhood; as police search for the truth, they are stunned to learn that one of their own might be involved.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: When two women call 911 after hearing someone break into their apartment, their call for help holds the key to solving the mysterious murder of a young graduate student named Katie Sepich.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: Two Tulsa brothers fight for more than 20 years to prove their innocence after they were wrongfully convicted for separate murders.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: Terrorism is suspected when a woman's truck explodes outside of the daycare center where she works.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: When a Chicago woman from a big family goes missing, investigators begin to suspect a man in her life is full of secrets.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: Suspicions arise when a man's wife dies in a house fire and then a second tragedy claims his son's life.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: Mysterious deaths occur inside a traveling commune, starting an investigation that lasts more than a decade; two sisters -- former commune members -- reveal stories that involve lies, lust and greed.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: The murder of former NBA star and hometown hero Lorenzen Wright sends shockwaves through the city of Memphis; insiders speak out about new developments in the lengthy search for justice.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: When three people are found dead on the same day in a Kentucky town, investigators know it isn't a coincidence; years pass before there's an arrest as the case continues to divide the community.

programme.title: Dateline NBC
programme.desc: A couple's anniversary celebration ends in murder during what appears to have been a home invasion, but investigators believe the suspect might be connected to the victim.

programme.title: Flavor of Love: What Happens in Flavor Stays in Flavor
programme.desc: Flavor Flav is a good luck person. So he needs a good luck woman. To test the girls on this trait, he flies the seven remaining women to Vegas on his private jet.

programme.title: Flavor of Love: InterroGitted
programme.desc: There's six girls left so Flav brings out the big guns. He flies Brigitte Neilsen into town to get to know the girls a little better.

programme.title: Flavor of Love: Flav's Trippin
programme.desc: Flav takes two of the young ladies to Palm Springs for a spa retreat where things get muddy, wet and crazy.

programme.title: Flavor of Love: Family Flavors
programme.desc: Three girls are left! Things are getting serious so Flav decides it's time to meet the ladies' parents.

programme.title: Studs
programme.desc: Ladies from the past return for a second chance at love.

programme.title: Rock of Love: Bret’s Rock of Love
programme.desc: Bret takes his final two girls south of the border to spend some quality, romantic time with each one before making his final choice.

programme.title: Rock of Love: Hustle on the Bustle
programme.desc: Twice unlucky in love, this time Bret Michaels leaves his mansion behind and takes twenty even more beautiful babes on tour with him to find a girlfriend who can handle his life on the road.

programme.title: Rock of Love: Fifteen Weddings And Three Funerals
programme.desc: Fifteen girls take turns reciting their own wedding vows to Bret.

programme.title: Rock of Love: Babes On Ice
programme.desc: Bret is looking for a woman with maternal instincts, so he puts his twelve girls in ice skates to see how well they protect “Baby Bret” against the University of Illinois Women's Hockey Team and special guest player, Lacey.

programme.title: Rock of Love: Roadies
programme.desc: Bret Michaels has a concert tonight. Ten girls compete to see who can clear the band's equipment off the stage the fastest.

programme.title: Rock of Love: Eight Is Not Enough
programme.desc: The eight remaining girls get a distressing “wake-up call” when Bret brings in three new girls to join the tour because he's not feeling the emotional effort.

programme.title: Rock of Love: Mudbowl III
programme.desc: It's Pink Bus vs. Blue Bus in the muddiest of Mudbowls yet! Bret flies away with the MVP for an intimate overnight trip.

programme.title: Rock of Love: Truck Stop Games
programme.desc: In a wacky competition based on beer, babes and truckers, one team will try anything to sway the judges.

programme.title: Rock of Love: Bikini Day Care
programme.desc: The tour hits Panama City Beach, Florida. Seven girls show their mothering skills by taking care of a gaggle of rowdy youngsters at the pool.

programme.desc: Eli organizes a surprise birthday party to cheer Clare up, and starts to suspect that she's hiding something. Audra urges Drew to go back to Degrassi. Dave worries that he and Alli are growing apart.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: When a group of parents try to stop the play, Eli takes action. As opening night approaches, Tristan realizes that if he doesn't find a boyfriend fast, his first kiss will be onstage -- with Dave. Meanwhile, Becky wants to "save" Adam.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: On opening night for Romeo and Jules, Tristan is nowhere to be found. Is it stage fright -- or something worse? While Eli is busy with the play, Clare decides to get even with Asher.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation

programme.desc: Frustrated with her heavy workload, Alli decides to have a little fun -- with or without Dave.

programme.desc: After Drew moves out, there's a break-in at the loft, and Fiona fears for her safety. Someone from Dallas' past pays him a surprise visit. A tough assignment forces Zig to think about the mistakes he's made.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: Maya lets loose at a party and posts a video online, hoping it'll change her image. The battle for the student council presidency heats up when Drew enters the race. Connor tries to play matchmaker for his friends.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: After a stressful audition, Maya tosses her cello in the trash, and decides to have more fun. The competition between Drew and Clare intensifies. Connor offers Eli some advice about love.

programme.title: Degrassi: The Next Generation
programme.desc: School's out and summer's in! A few lucky Degrassi students are bound for a once-in-a-lifetime trip to Paris, accompanied by some fresh new faces. And then there are others playing counselor at Degrassi Day Camp.

programme.title: Ancient Worlds
programme.desc: Starting in Uruk, the `mother of all cities', in southern Iraq, Richard travels to Syria, Egypt, Anatolia and Greece, tracing the birth and development of technology and culture.

programme.title: Ancient Worlds
programme.desc: Richard looks at the winners and losers of the great Bronze Age collapse, and the new powers that emerged in the harder-edged Age of Iron.

programme.title: Ancient Worlds
programme.desc: Richard Miles explores the power and the paradox of the `Greek Thing', a blossoming in art, philosophy and science that went hand-in-hand with political discord, social injustice and endless war.

programme.title: Ancient Worlds
programme.desc: In Richard Miles's epic story of civilisation, there have been plenty of examples of the great men of history, but none came close to the legend of Alexander of Macedon, known as `the Great'.

programme.title: Ancient Worlds
programme.desc: Archaeologist and historian Richard Miles examines the phenomenon of the Roman Republic, from its fratricidal mythical beginnings, with the legend of Romulus and Remus, to the all too real violence of its end.

programme.title: Ancient Worlds
programme.desc: The material benefits of the `good order' delivered by Roman rule provided its citizens and subjects with the security to ask profound questions about the meaning of life, questions that the Roman belief system was ill-equipped to answer.

programme.title: Horizon
programme.desc: A US law has been passed forcing the return of ethnic artefacts and ancestral remains to native communities.

programme.title: Natural World
programme.desc: A look at the world of the African driver ant, a violent miniature monster which kills every living thing it can pin down and slice up.

programme.title: Journeys From the Centre of the Earth
programme.desc: Dr Iain Stewart looks at how earthquakes and faults have shaped human history by bringing both life and death.

programme.title: Journeys From the Centre of the Earth
programme.desc: Dr Iain Stewart looks at how rocks have influenced the architecture of the Mediterranean, from the pyramids of Egypt to the squares of ancient Greece.

programme.title: Journeys From the Centre of the Earth
programme.desc: Tracing the history of cave paintings.

programme.title: Journeys From the Centre of the Earth
programme.desc: Dr Iain Stewart examines how the rocks beneath our feet played a crucial role in determining the beliefs of ancient civilisations.

programme.title: Journeys From the Centre of the Earth
programme.desc: Dr Iain Stewart looks at how ancient civilisations learned to exploit the water around them, from the flooding of our Stone Age ancestors' hunting grounds to the fall of the Roman Empire.

programme.title: Doctor Who: The Brain of Morbius
programme.desc: The Doctor challenges Morbius to a mental duel in which only one of them will survive.

programme.title: Doctor Who: The Seeds of Doom
programme.desc: When the Doctor learns of the discovery of two alien seed pods in the Antarctic, he and Sarah rush to investigate. But they are too late. A man is already turning into a Krynoid.

programme.title: Doctor Who: The Seeds of Doom
programme.desc: The Krynoid is on the loose in the arctic. Scorby and Keeler have been sent to steal the alien pod and are willing to resort to murder to cover their tracks.

programme.title: Doctor Who: The Seeds of Doom
programme.desc: The Doctor and Sarah track down the remaining Krynoid pod to the estate of Harrison Chase. The millionaire botanist intends to use the pod to change a human victim into a Krynoid.

programme.title: Doctor Who: The Seeds of Doom
programme.desc: Keeler has been infected by the alien pod and is transforming into a Krynoid. Chase refuses to listen to the Doctor’s warning and throws him into a compost machine.

programme.title: Doctor Who: The Seeds of Doom
programme.desc: The Krynoid demands that the Doctor be surrendered to it. But the Doctor escapes to seek help. Sarah and Scorby, still trapped on the estate, battle against the living plants.

programme.title: Doctor Who: The Seeds of Doom
programme.desc: The Doctor, Sarah, and Scorby are hunted down by the mad Harrison Chase. Outside the Krynoid prepares to germinate, sending its deadly seed pods out across the land.

programme.title: Doctor Who: The Deadly Assassin
programme.desc: The Doctor returns to Gallifrey and races to prevent a tragedy.

programme.title: Doctor Who: The Deadly Assassin
programme.desc: The Time Lord president has been assassinated and the Doctor is the prime suspect.

programme.title: Doctor Who: The Deadly Assassin
programme.desc: The Doctor enters the virtual world of the Matrix hoping to track down the Master.

programme.title: Doctor Who: The Deadly Assassin
programme.desc: The Master makes his final bid to release the devastating power of the Time Lords.

programme.title: Doctor Who: The Robots of Death
programme.desc: The TARDIS takes the Doctor and Leela to a huge, mobile sand mine on an alien world.

programme.title: Doctor Who: The Robots of Death
programme.desc: The Doctor and Leela are blamed for the murder of one of the sandminer's crew.
