programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Join Jack on an amazing safari through Kenya's Masai Mara as he braves the rushing Mara River filled with Hippos and Nile Crocs. Then Jack explores wildlife after dark.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown
programme.desc: Come along for some epic Hanna family adventures like game ranger training in South Africa, babysitting a wombat in Tasmania, trekking with mandrills in Gabon, a horseback safari through Montana and a trip to meet some donkeys in Arizona!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Join Jack as he visits one of his favorite African destinations while enjoying beautiful unspoiled vistas, meeting amazing Masai people, and getting up close and personal with the animal population, including lions, elephants, hyenas, ostriches, and more!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Join Jack as he travels to the remote Sukau River on the island of Borneo in Malaysia where he gets a seldom-seen look at pygmy elephants as they emerge from the rain forest.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown
programme.desc: See a pattern on this Wild Countdown? Whether it’s for camouflage or advertising deadly venom, every creature on today’s countdown is sporting stripes. Tigers, zebras, sea snakes, ring-tailed lemurs and more!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Jungle Jack is crisscrossing the planet to meet up with Gorillas, Chimpanzees and Orangutans. Come along for a journey with our closest living relatives, the Great Apes.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Jack visits the exciting city of Los Angeles, where he meets up with some new friends, including his good pal Betty White! Come along as Jack makes a visit to a talk show with animals in tow.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown
programme.desc: Cold blooded creatures all need warmth to survive, but they can be found some in some very different habitats. Come along with Jack as he crisscrosses the globe to meet stingrays, giant tortoises, scorpions, thorny devils and more!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Big Bear Countdown
programme.desc: Join Jack as he counts down his coolest bear experiences… trekking the elusive spirit bear in Alaska, helping return a grizzly to his home in Montana, and meeting an adorable baby black bear in New Mexico. Plus 7 more amazing bear experiences.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Come along into the heart of the Amazon River Basin as Jack explores untouched jungles that are teeming with wildlife.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Jack heads to Ecuador's highlands to visit a colorful Ecuadorian market before heading to Parque Condor, a rehabilitation center for injured and orphaned birds of prey, like Owls, Eagles, and Condors.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown
programme.desc: Jungle Jack explores villages that are way off the beaten path to meet the people who live there and the animals that surround them, like cheetahs in South Africa, spider monkeys in the Amazon, hippos along the Zambezi, lions in Kenya and more!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown
programme.desc: Jungle Jack joins the conservationists racing to save incredible species from extinction. Sea Turtles, Giraffe, Painted Dogs, Cheetahs, Whooping Cranes, and more!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Colossal Creatures
programme.desc: Jack travels the world meeting six colossal creatures, like the African elephant, Galapagos tortoise, ostrich, whale shark, mandrill and anaconda!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: At Hwange National Park in Zimbabwe, Jack heads out on a Lion-tracking expedition learning the dynamic social structure of these amazing Big Cats! And, Jack hits the trail looking for one of the most rare and endangered species in Africa.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Join Jungle Jack for a journey down south to Florida's Everglades where he meets gators, snakes, and other creatures from the swamp.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown
programme.desc: Come along with Jungle Jack as he explores biomes around the world, and the creatures that live there, like Lions, Black Caiman, Tiger Sharks, Tarantulas, and more!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Animal Adventures
programme.desc: Jack and Kathaleen hike up a mountain in Phukett, Thailand to assist in the back-to-the-wild release of two endangered gibbons. The Hannas visit to The Gibbon Sanctuary, where the sick or injured small apes are rehabilitated.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Jack joins in on a mission to save an Elephant caught in a deadly snare, before getting a glimpse of life on the savannah for Lions and Leopards.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Help Wanted
programme.desc: There’s no job too big or small for Jungle Jack as he gets to work as a horse farrier, baboon crossing guard, beekeeper and more!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Misunderstood Animals
programme.desc: Today, Jungle Jack is going to reveal the truth about some of the animal kingdom’s most misunderstood creatures, like sharks, stingrays, wolves, gators and more!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown
programme.desc: Meet creatures that couple up for keeps, like Magellanic penguins, West Africa’s Red River hogs, Chilean flamingos, golden lion tamarins and more. Love is in the air on this Wild Countdown!

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Jack's heading to the southern tip of Chile to bring you this adventure. Kicking off this trip in a town that pays serious homage to the famous explorer Magellan, Jack boards a boat for Magdalena Island home to a breeding colony of Magellanic Penguins.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Into the Wild
programme.desc: Jack and Suzi explore Catalina Island, off the coast of California, and track down a herd of wild Bison that have been living there since 1924. They also uncover bats roosting in an old barn and meet the island's local veterinarian.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown: Horses
programme.desc: Join Jack as he’s counting down ten amazing equine experiences! From a horseback safari in Botswana and a dude ranch in Montana to retirement home for horses in Florida, Jack is saddling up for ten incredible horse encounters.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Wild Countdown
programme.desc: Join Jungle Jack as he meets record-breakers in the animal kingdom like the fastest feline, the animal with the strongest jaws, the world's loudest species, and lots of other chart-topping creatures.

programme.title: Jack Hanna's Animal Adventures
programme.desc: At a training center of Canine Companions for Independence, Jack learns how dogs are trained to assist the disabled. From volunteer-raised puppies to graduates of the advanced training program, CCI dogs are something special.

programme.title: Jamie & Jimmy's Food Fight Club
programme.desc: Jamie shows actor Josh Hartnett how to cook his favourite ramen dish; a game and aubergine curry recipe; a taste of the future of farming.

programme.title: Jamie & Jimmy's Food Fight Club

programme.title: Jamie's 30 Minute Meals
programme.desc: Piri piri chicken with dressed potatoes, rocket salad and quick Portuguese tarts.

programme.title: Jamie's 30 Minute Meals
programme.desc: Jamie cooks Thai red prawn curry with jasmine rice, cucumber salad and a papaya platter are on the menu.

programme.title: Jamie's 30 Minute Meals
programme.desc: Jamie Oliver shows how to make roast beef with baby Yorkshires, little carrots, crispy potatoes and super-quick gravy, all, amazingly, in half an hour.

programme.title: Oliver's Twist
programme.desc: Jamie shows London police how to prepare spicy foods; cellophane noodle salad; monkfish; mango lassi.

programme.title: Oliver's Twist
programme.desc: High-carb dinners; carpaccio with baby beets; tagliatelle with saffron; lime and basil sorbet.

programme.title: Oliver's Twist
programme.desc: Jamie shows pushbike couriers how to make great lunches; squashed cherry tomato salad; meatballs; calzones.

programme.title: Oliver's Twist
programme.desc: Jamie prepares chick pea and leek soup, braised lamb shanks and English trifle for the men renovating his flat.

programme.title: Oliver's Twist
programme.desc: Vegetarian meal; mushroom sarnie; tagliatelle; pecan and vanilla ice cream.

programme.title: Oliver's Twist

programme.title: Oliver's Twist
programme.desc: A post-match meal for rugby players; chicken in milk; proper polenta; panettone bread-and-butter pudding.

programme.title: Save With Jamie

programme.title: Jamie's Easy Meals for Every Day

programme.title: Jamie's Easy Meals for Every Day

programme.title: Jamie's Easy Meals for Every Day
programme.desc: Jamie makes a super-easy, flavour-packed rice dish with chorizo and prawns; Buddy makes some treats for sharing with his chocolate-dipped strawberries and cherries; Jamie makes his spectacular Indian-inspired frittata.

programme.title: Jamie's Easy Meals for Every Day

programme.desc: Sticky toffee pudding; steak and onion sandwich.

programme.desc: A father takes too much of a liking to his son's new girlfriend; a bachelor is terrified at the idea of marrying his gung-ho girlfriend; the crew gives a troubled teen a chance at rehabilitation. (TV-PG)

programme.title: The Love Boat

programme.title: The Love Boat

programme.title: The Love Boat
programme.desc: Estelle Castlewood (Celeste Holm) begins to discover what a charming gentleman Bertram McDonald (Sir John Mills) is when she meets him as an equal aboard ship in "A Good and Faithful Servant.

programme.title: The Love Boat

programme.title: The Love Boat
programme.desc: Two shy people keep missing each other, due in part to Gopher's interference; two residents of old folks home take a cruise, only to be followed by their meddling children.

programme.title: The Love Boat
programme.desc: Julie ends up in the middle of an unusual love triangle when the visiting 13-year-old son of the head of the cruise line develops a crush on her at the same time that she is trying to win over a charming older passenger.

programme.title: The Love Boat
programme.desc: A singer tries to persuade his manager to let him abandon the shock tactics that made him famous and let his music speak for itself.

programme.title: The Love Boat
programme.desc: One-time stowaway April Lopez returns to the ship as a popular singer. However, she grows tired of the hassles of fame and decides that she would like to become a cruise director.

programme.title: The Love Boat
programme.desc: Gopher gives his parents a cruise as a Mother's Day present. Gopher's father grows jealous of the close relationship between mother and son.

programme.title: The Love Boat
programme.desc: Julie catches love fever on the high seas and is thinking of marriage when the Pacific Princess is chartered for a dazzling star-studded wedding cruise that takes Capt. Stubing, his crew, and their guests on a beautiful scenic journey to Alaska.

programme.title: The Love Boat
programme.desc: Wealthy Alaskan Buddy Bowers (Lorne Greene) recruits the services of the ship to take the wedding party from Vancouver, B.C., to Skagway, Alaska, for the nuptial ceremonies for his orphaned granddaughter, Carol (Lisa Hartman).

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Sometimes the scales of justice are balanced by just a few milligrams of evidence – a couple of fibers, a tooth filling, or a smudge on a piece of tape. The biggest cases are often solved by the smallest clues.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: The Naval Criminal Investigative Service uses forensic science to solve three perplexing murders and fulfill their motto: “To the living we owe respect; to the dead, we owe the truth”.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: For homicide investigators, it's a race against time as they track their deadliest foe: a serial killer for whom killing is the only way to feel alive.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: A millionaire is found dead, murdered for a stash of buried silver. A young woman dates violent men, only to be killed by her best friend.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: In New York, an ambitious college student has her whole life ahead of her, until she crosses the path of a killer. It's a random murder, the hardest kind to solve.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: A New York homebuyer gets more than he bargained for when a house inspection turns up a mummified corpse. For decades, the crime had gone undiscovered. The victim unmissed, and the killer unpunished.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: A southeastern Virginia community is stunned by a crime no one can believe. A pregnant woman murdered, her baby lost. Across the state, another town feels a similar shock, a brutal, random slaying in a most unexpected setting.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Weeks pass as forensic investigators search for even the smallest clues, only to find what they feared in their own backyard. In Canada, two people die suddenly of unknown causes, and their deaths may not be as coincidental as they first appear.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Years after a murder has been committed, investigators use advanced DNA analysis to shed new light on crimes that have gone unpunished for far too long.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: The Great Outdoors may offer great clues to solving brutal murders. But it takes the keen eye of the forensic entomologist and botanist to decipher the clues nature provides.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: The tread of a tire, a single shoe print and even the shape of a bruise help investigators track down killers, based solely on their patterns of guilt.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Using science as their most powerful weapon, investigators must find these hired killers and make them pay the true price of murder.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Accidental deaths, suicides, disappearances, and fires; they're an everyday part of an insurance investigator's life. But cases shouldn't be taken at face value. Forensics has become a tool for exposing insurance fraud.

programme.title: The New Detectives
programme.desc: Ballistic analysis is the key to finding killers who turn guns on their victims. Each shot fired leaves its own “fingerprint”, allowing scientists to target murderers with deadly aim.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
